    mergeron.gen.data_generation¶

    Methods to generate market data, including shares price, marginsm, and diversion ratios for analyzing merger enforcement policy.

    Module Contents¶

    class mergeron.gen.data_generation.SeedSequenceData[source]¶

    Bases: NamedTuple

    mktshr_rng_seed_seq : numpy.random.SeedSequence[source]¶
    pcm_rng_seed_seq : numpy.random.SeedSequence[source]¶
    fcount_rng_seed_seq : numpy.random.SeedSequence | None[source]¶
    pr_rng_seed_seq : numpy.random.SeedSequence | None[source]¶
    mergeron.gen.data_generation.gen_market_sample(_mkt_sample_spec, /, *, sample_size=10**6, seed_seq_list=None, nthreads=16)[source]¶

    Generate share, diversion ratio, price, and margin data for MarketSpec.

    Parameters:¶
    _mkt_sample_spec : mergeron.gen.MarketSpec¶

    class specifying parameters for data generation, see mergeron.gen.MarketSpec

    sample_size : int¶

    number of draws to generate

    seed_seq_list : list[numpy.random.SeedSequence] | None¶

    tuple of SeedSequences to ensure replicable data generation with appropriately independent random streams

    nthreads : int¶

    optionally specify the number of CPU threads for the PRNG

    Returns:¶

    Merging firms’ shares, margins, etc. for each hypothetical merger in the sample

    Return type:¶

    mergeron.gen.MarketDataSample

    mergeron.gen.data_generation.parse_seed_seq_list(_sseq_list, _mktshr_dist_type, _price_spec, /)[source]¶

    Initialize RNG seed sequences to ensure independence of distinct random streams.

    The tuple of SeedSequences, is parsed in the following order for generating the relevant random variates: 1.) quantity shares 2.) price-cost margins 3.) firm-counts, if MarketSpec.share_spec.dist_type is a Dirichlet distribution 4.) prices, if MarketSpec.price_spec ==mergeron.gen.PriceConstants.ZERO.

    Parameters:¶
    _sseq_list : list[numpy.random.SeedSequence] | None¶

    List of RNG seed sequences

    _mktshr_dist_type : mergeron.gen.SHRConstants¶

    Market share distribution type

    _price_spec : mergeron.gen.PriceConstants¶

    Price specification

    Returns:¶

    Seed sequence data

    Return type:¶

    SeedSequenceData

    mergeron.gen.data_generation.gen_divr_array(_recapture_form, _recapture_rate, _frmshr_array, _aggregate_purchase_prob=EMPTY_ARRAY_DEFAULT, /)[source]¶

    Given merging-firm shares and related parameters, return diverion ratios.

    If recapture is specified as mergeron.RECConstants.OUTIN, then the choice-probability for the outside good must be supplied.

    Parameters:¶
    _recapture_form : mergeron.RECConstants¶

    Enum specifying Fixed (proportional), Inside-out, or Outside-in

    _recapture_rate : float | None¶

    If recapture is proportional or inside-out, the recapture rate for the firm with the smaller share.

    _frmshr_array : numpy.typing.NDArray[numpy.float64]¶

    Merging-firm shares.

    _aggregate_purchase_prob : numpy.typing.NDArray[numpy.float64]¶

    1 minus probability that the outside good is chosen; converts market shares to choice probabilities by multiplication.

    Returns:¶

    Merging-firm diversion ratios for mergers in the sample.

    Return type:¶

    numpy.typing.NDArray[numpy.float64]
